item.title: Matt Damon’s The Great Wall Drops A Massive Trailer With Tons Of Details
item.description: The Great Wall is a film that's been under quite a bit of controversy for its previous marketing and casting tactics. Whether that's fair or not is to be decided once the film is out, however this extended look at the film does have us thinking the reaction may have been a bit early in...

item.title: Tom Cruise’s The Mummy Trailer Teases Gods, Monsters And Scares
item.description: A new trailer for The Mummy has just hit the web, and it promises a ton of supernatural horror and action. Check it out!

item.title: New Smurfs Trailer Resets The Franchise, Is Actually Very Funny
item.description: A new trailer for Smurfs: The Lost Village just dropped, and it shows great promise for the future of the franchise. Check it out!

item.title: Robert De Niro’s The Comedian Trailer Is Funny And Star-Studded
item.description: Is Robert De Niro's _The Comedian _actually going to be funny? Watch the trailer to find out.

item.title: New Passengers Trailer Makes It Look Like A Jennifer Lawrence And Chris Pratt Rom-Com
item.description: The latest Passengers trailer is a lot more lovey-dovey than we were expecting. Is that a good thing?

item.title: Denzel Washington And Viola Davis Look Like Oscar Frontrunners In Powerful Fences Trailer
item.description: Though the movie hasn't screened widely, top critics were able to see Fences ahead of its December 16 limited bow. To date, the film boasts a 90% Fresh grade on Rotten Tomatoes.

item.title: Final Rogue One Trailer Brings More Humor, More X-Wing Fighters, And Darth Vader
item.description: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story is now less than a month away and as we fly toward the release one final trailer has been released that may show us who the real star of the show is, the droid.

item.title: Goon 2 Red-Band Trailer Loaded With Fighting, Cursing And Hockey
item.description: The first trailer for Goon: Last Of The Enforcers has emerged, and it looks like it could be a promising follow-up to the successful 2011 original.

item.title: Martin Scorsese's Silence Trailer Is Intense And Chilling, Watch It Now
item.description: Martin Scorsese's Silence has been a movie cloaked in mystery. For months, we didn't even know when the master's latest drama would reach theaters. And from an awards perspective, it's one of the last shoes to drop as we wait to analyze all of the possible contenders.

item.title: The Kong: Skull Island Trailer Is Primal And Harrowing, Watch It Now
item.description: Godzilla wasn't the beginning for the agency known as Monarch, as history will show that King Kong's mighty antics also fell under the organization's watchful eye. See the latest footage from Kong: Skull Island, in the brand new trailer inside.

item.title: First Transformers 5 Footage Sneaks Into Exclusive IMAX Clip
item.description: We don't yet have a trailer for Transformers: The Last Knight, the fifth movie in the ongoing series, but scenes from the sequel have found their way into a new IMAX featurette celebrating the cyber-franchise's relationship with IMAX technology and the cameras.

item.title: Batman Confronts The Supernatural In DC’s First Justice League Dark Trailer
item.description: It looks like the Justice League is about to face some pretty dark times. Good thing John Constantine is around to provide a much needed light. Watch the trailer for the animated Justice League Dark film, inside.

item.title: Bryan Cranston And James Franco Have No Filter In Nasty, NSFW Red-Band Why Him Trailer
item.description: Christmas is usually the time for lovely, family movies about people coming together to celebrate the holidays in peace and joy. This is not that movie.

item.title: Devastating Patriots Day Trailer Delivers An Explosion, A Manhunt, And The Healing
item.description: Patriots Day teased audiences of what's to come with an earlier trailer, but this full reel shows exactly where Wahlberg and Berg are heading with their upcoming drama.

item.title: Disney’s New Beauty And The Beast Trailer Is Magical And Perfect, Watch It Now
item.description: Disney has had some amazing success thus far remaking some of the animated films, but until now, they've stayed away from their most popular movies. What would it look like when they tried to tackle one of their most beloved stories?

item.title: The Ghost In The Shell Trailer Is Here And It’s Stunning
item.description: Could Ghost In The Shell be a merging of The Matrix and Blade Runner? Almost certainly not, but it still looks sensational.

item.title: International Rogue One Trailer Packs In Tons Of New Footage, Including Darth Vader
item.description: We are weeks away from the Rebellion getting the upperhand on that evil Empire when Rogue One: A Star Wars Story invades theaters on December 16.

item.title: The First Valerian Trailer Is Fifth Element Meets Guardians, And Will Blow Your Mind
item.description: Today is the day we've really been looking forward to, however, as we now get to share with you the first trailer for the movie. And looking like a hybrid of The Fifth Element and Guardians of the Galaxy, it will absolutely blow your mind.

item.title: The LEGO Batman Movie Trailer Is Hilarious, A Little Bit Sad, But Really Great
item.description: Warner Bros has dropped a new preview for The LEGO Batman Movie that's packed with even more DC-brick insanity. Check it out!

item.title: New La La Land Trailer: Feast Your Eyes On The Year’s Best Movie
item.description: Lionsgate is doing what it can to get the word out on La La Land, probably knowing that once it starts screening, word of mouth will do the rest.

item.title: The New Wonder Woman Trailer Is Enchanting And Explosive
item.description: Only three months after the San Diego Comic-Con preview, Warner Bros has released a new action-packed Wonder Woman trailer to get fans more excited for its release. Check it out!

item.title: New Sing Trailer Makes Animated Musical Look Like The Voice Mixed With Eminem’s 8 Mile
item.description: A new trailer for Garth Jennings' Sing has just hit the web, and it's guaranteed to make you want to follow your dreams.

item.title: Vin Diesel's xXx: Return Of Xander Cage Trailer Is Good, Extreme And Completely Insane
item.description: Vin Diesel doesn't do anything in half measures. So fans know that if he's actually going to return to the xXx franchise -- the one he helped launch back in 2002 -- then he was going to do everything in his power to push the action over the top.

item.title: Chris Evans Struggles To Raise A Genius Child In First Gifted Trailer
item.description: Chris Evans can't spend all of his time in a Captain America suit. His career would get boring after a while.

item.title: Life Trailer Has Ryan Reynolds And Jake Gyllenhaal In Space, Is Super Creepy
item.description: ome of Rhett Reese and Paul Wernick's best work as screenwriters has come because of their ability to inject terrific humor into otherwise serious scenarios. Their next project, Life, seems to have replaced casual humor with intense scares, however, as you'll see in the brand new...

item.title: International Logan Trailer Has New Scenes, More Violence
item.description: As is sometimes the case, a big Hollywood movie will cut a separate trailer aimed at international audiences, because they tend to be a little more tolerant of questionable content versus those of us in the States.

item.title: The Logan Trailer Is Brutal, Vicious and Outstanding
item.description: Following yesterday's six-second tease, the first Logan trailer has finally arrived. Check it out!

item.title: Watch A Tiny Bit Of The Logan Trailer Right Now
item.description: After 16 years in the role of Marvel's mighty mutant, Logan will (allegedly) be the actor's last feature wearing the Wolverine claws, and he looks to be going out with a loose adaptation of a popular storyline Old Man Logan.

item.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy 2 Now Has A U.S. Trailer, And It's Incredible
item.description: Marvel is starting to drop its Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 footage at a fast and furious clip. Minutes after a Russian version of the first teaser trailer for Guardians 2 landed, a cleaner U.S. version featuring Star-Lord (Chris Pratt) and Drax (Dave Bautista) speaking in a...

item.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy 2 Just Got A Foreign Trailer And It's Weird And Worth Watching
item.description: This reportedly is the first official international trailer for Gunn's Guardians sequel. It's in Russian. It relies heavily on a song from the first movie. It's... weird. Give it a spin.

item.title: New Assassin’s Creed Trailer Finally Brings The Game To Life On Screen
item.description: A seriously badass new trailer for the upcoming Assassin's Creed movie has finally hit the web, and the movie finally looks exactly like the game. Check it out!

item.title: The Army Of One Trailer Features Nic Cage... Trying To Murder Osama Bin Laden... By Himself
item.description: Watch Nic Cage try to hunt down Osama Bin Laden in a brand new trailer for his upcoming film, Army of One.

item.title: Alec Baldwin Trades Donald Trump Impressions For Dirty Diapers In The Boss Baby Trailer
item.description: Animation appears to be going through something of a renaissance as several studios are putting out successful projects. Now Dreamworks has unveiled their follow-up to next months' Trolls with The Boss Baby.

item.title: New Fantastic Beasts Video Hints At A Major Tie-In To The Harry Potter Universe
item.description: IMAX is hosting a major fan event in anticipation of Fantastic Beasts and Where To Find Them today. At the start, Warner Bros. dropped a new video,...

item.title: The Final Star Wars: Rogue One Trailer Is Exciting, Rebellious And Filled With Hope
item.description: We're only two months away from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story's release, so what better way to mark the occasion than with a brand new trailer? Take a look!

item.title: Watch Natalie Portman’s Fascinating Jackie Trailer, Obsess Over The Way She Says Camelot
item.description: Portman's performance in Jackie as Jacqueline Kennedy during the final days of Camelot -- including the assassination of her husband, and the difficult days that followed -- have her back in the Academy Award conversation, and after this debut trailer, we can understand why.

item.title: Jordan Peele’s Get Out Trailer Is Disturbing And Bizarre, Watch It Now
item.description: Comedian and actor Jordan Peele is stepping into the world of horror with the upcoming film Get Out, and it looks absolutely horrifying.

item.title: Mark Wahlberg's Patriots Day Trailer Is Harrowing And Emotional, Watch It Now
item.description: Patriots Day just dropped its first official trailer, and its somber and chilling. Check it out now.

item.title: First Pirates Of The Caribbean 5 Trailer Centers On Javier Bardem's Terrifying Villain
item.description: While Johnny Depp's Captain Jack Sparrow was only a supporting character in the original Pirates of the Caribbean, the sequels decided to put the bumbling drunk front and center. So where is he now?

item.title: Full Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them Trailer Is Dark And Beautiful, Watch It Now
item.description: The newest trailer for the next adventure in the Wizarding World has been released, and finally gives a good look at all those fantastic beasts.

item.title: New Doctor Strange Trailer Packs In Fantastic New Footage Of Magic And Sorcery
item.description: "The Avengers protect the world from physical dangers. We safeguard it against more mystical threats." With that line of dialogue, Marvel Studios tries to declare, with certainty, how its fourteenth feature film, Doctor Strange, will stand apart from everything that came before it.

item.title: Denzel Washington And Viola Davis Look Like Sure-Fire Oscar Contenders In First Fences Trailer
item.description: Denzel Washington's movie adaptation of the play Fences just got its first teaser, and he and Viola Davis are giving some insane performances. Check it out.

item.title: This Bad Santa 2 Red-Band Trailer Is Filthy, Hilarious And Totally NSFW
item.description: A brand new red-band trailer for the upcoming Bad Santa sequel has just hit the web, and it's even ruder than you think. Check it out!

item.title: Chris Pratt And Jennifer Lawrence's Passengers Trailer Is Mysterious And Fascinating, Watch It Now
item.description: After years of waiting, Passengers is finally entering our atmosphere, and we've got the trailer to prove it. Prepare to be blown away by Jennifer Lawrence and Chris Pratt's spectacular space journey, inside.

item.title: Annabelle 2 Trailer Is Here To Send Serious Chills Down Your Spine
item.description: This has been a huge year for the Conjuring franchise. Not only was James Wan's The Conjuring 2 a smash hit in theaters this summer, but a brand new spin-off was announced in The Nun, which is in active development.

item.title: Amy Adams' Sexy Nocturnal Animals Trailer Is Dark And Dangerous, Watch It Now
item.description: Tom Ford made his name as an American fashion designer before shifting gears to film, and he's often praised for his visual eye over his narrative prowess. The reviews on Nocturnal Animals has us believing he could find his way into the Oscar race this year -- the win in Venice was a...

item.title: Disney’s Moana Trailer Is Magical And Hilarious, Watch It Now
item.description: Disney's newest animated feature will take us to the islands of the Pacific Ocean. While we've seen the beauty that Moana has in store before, the new trailer finally gives us some explanation of what the movie is all about.

item.title: The Tupac Biopic Trailer All Eyez On Me Is Violent, Powerful And NSFW
item.description: Appropriately enough, the upcoming movie detailing Tupac's troubled career, and his untimely death, dropped its first trailer and it is incendiary. Check out the latest footage from All Eyez on Me, the Tupac Shakur biopic (but know that it's NSFW, so don't press play if your bosses are...

item.title: The Fifty Shades Darker Trailer Is Hot And Steamy, Watch It Now
item.description: The other days, Universal teased fans with a quick snippet of footage for Fifty Shades Darker, the anticipated follow up to the smash hit based on E.L. James' bestselling novel.

item.title: Fifty Shades Darker Teases Us With An Intriguing Trailer Teaser
item.description: Last year, the book sensation Fifty Shades of Grey made a huge impact when it landed at the box office on Valentine's Day weekend - and it was clear immediately that we would soon be seeing development of a sequel.
